name: Rapid Bridge
overview: Rapid Bridge, a semiconductor technology company, creates and deploys silicon implementation technology for the semiconductor companies. It offers LiquidIP, a metal programmable intellectual property (IP), which allows designers to create and configure a base platform within the industry standard EDA flows; LiquidASIC, a collection of pre-defined configurable ASIC platforms, including interface subsystems, memories, SerDes, register files, and foundation IPs; and LiquidSoC, a methodology for designing custom system-on-chips solutions. The companyâ€™s products are used in the integrated circuit design and development at nanometer technology in various market segments, including networking, storage, consumer, telecoms, mil/aero, and mobility. Rapid Bridge, LLC was founded in 2004 and is based in San Diego, California with a design center in Raleigh, North Carolina.

acquisition.source_description: Qualcomm to Acquire the Assets of Semiconductor Design Innovator Rapid Bridge
